channel.title: Portal and Portal 2 one whole game
channel.description: Anyone else think that it'd be cool to see Portal and Portal 2 just merge into one whole game?

item.title: Portal and Portal 2 one whole game
item.dc:creator: Jack_Freeman
item.description:
DrasarSalman:

What if you opened your eyes and a sandwich was beside your computer? Best. Wife. Ever!

Lol.

Kaweebo:

Anyone else think that it’d be cool to see Portal and Portal 2 just merge into one whole game?

No, I’d rather see my face and my palm just merge into one whole facepalm.

item.title: Portal and Portal 2 one whole game
item.dc:creator: Someonerandm
item.description:
DiePoente:

Anyone else think that it’d be cool to see Half Life and Half Life 2 and the episodes just merge into one whole game?

Simply, no.

This would be a pretty cool idea if someone else did it. I wouldn’t care enough to put effort into it.

Read full topic
